```bash
#!/bin/bash

# –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ OpenWebUI —Å PostgreSQL, OAuth –∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–æ–º
# –í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è: 1.0
# –î–∞—Ç–∞: $(date +%Y-%m-%d)

set -euo pipefail

# –¶–≤–µ—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥–∞
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

# –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è
log_info() { echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $1"; }
log_success() { echo -e "${GREEN}[SUCCESS]${NC} $1"; }
log_warning() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"; }

# –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤ root
check_root() {
    if [[ $EUID -eq 0 ]]; then
        log_error "–ù–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–π —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –æ—Ç root! –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π sudo –≥–¥–µ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ."
        exit 1
    fi
}

# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã
create_corp_structure() {
    log_info "üìÅ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—É—é —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π..."
    
    # –°—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –¥–ª—è dev –∏ prod —Å—Ä–µ–¥
    mkdir -p ~/openwebui-corp/{dev,prod}/{config,data,logs,certs,grafana,postgresql}
    mkdir -p ~/openwebui-corp/shared/{scripts,templates,backup}
    
    log_success "–°—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∞"
}

# –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
install_dependencies() {
    log_info "üì¶ –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—é –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏..."
    
    sudo apt update
    sudo apt install -y \
        docker.io \
        docker-compose-plugin \
        postgresql-client \
        nginx \
        certbot \
        python3-certbot-nginx \
        git \
        curl \
        jq \
        htop \
        fail2ban
    
    # –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—É docker
    sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
    
    log_success "–ó–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω—ã"
}

# –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è SSL —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ (—Å–∞–º–æ–ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è dev)
generate_ssl_certs() {
    local env=$1
    log_info "üîê –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É—é SSL —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è $env..."
    
    cd ~/openwebui-corp/$env/certs
    
    # –°–∞–º–æ–ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏
    if [[ ! -f server.crt ]]; then
        openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout server.key -out server.crt -days 365 -nodes \
            -subj "/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/O=Corp/CN=openwebui-$env.local"
        
        log_success "SSL —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω—ã –¥–ª—è $env"
    fi
}

# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ PostgreSQL
create_postgresql_config() {
    local env=$1
    log_info "üóÑÔ∏è –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é PostgreSQL –¥–ª—è $env..."
    
    cat > ~/openwebui-corp/$env/postgresql/init.sql << 'EOF'
-- –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –¥–ª—è OpenWebUI
CREATE DATABASE openwebui_db;
CREATE USER openwebui_user WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'CHANGE_THIS_PASSWORD';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE openwebui_db TO openwebui_user;

-- –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
ALTER DATABASE openwebui_db OWNER TO openwebui_user;
EOF

    # –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è PostgreSQL
    cat > ~/openwebui-corp/$env/postgresql/postgresql.conf << 'EOF'
# –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ PostgreSQL
listen_addresses = '*'
port = 5432
max_connections = 100
shared_buffers = 256MB
effective_cache_size = 1GB
maintenance_work_mem = 64MB
checkpoint_completion_target = 0.9
wal_buffers = 16MB
default_statistics_target = 100
random_page_cost = 1.1
effective_io_concurrency = 200

# –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
log_destination = 'stderr'
logging_collector = on
log_directory = '/var/log/postgresql'
log_filename = 'postgresql-%Y-%m-%d_%H%M%S.log'
log_statement = 'all'
log_min_duration_statement = 100

# –ë–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å
ssl = on
password_encryption = scram-sha-256
EOF
}

# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ docker-compose –¥–ª—è –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏
create_docker_compose() {
    local env=$1
    local port_offset=$2
    log_info "üê≥ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é docker-compose.yml –¥–ª—è –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è $env..."
    
    cat > ~/openwebui-corp/$env/docker-compose.yml << EOF
version: '3.8'

services:
  postgresql:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: openwebui-postgres-$env
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: openwebui_db
      POSTGRES_USER: openwebui_user
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: \${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-secure_password_123}
      POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD: scram-sha-256
    volumes:
      - ./postgresql/data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./postgresql/init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql:ro
      - ./postgresql/postgresql.conf:/etc/postgresql/postgresql.conf:ro
      - ./logs/postgresql:/var/log/postgresql
    ports:
      - "$((5432 + port_offset)):5432"
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: postgres -c config_file=/etc/postgresql/postgresql.conf
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U openwebui_user -d openwebui_db"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: openwebui-redis-$env
    command: redis-server --requirepass \${REDIS_PASSWORD:-redis_secure_123}
    ports:
      - "$((6379 + port_offset)):6379"
    volumes:
      - ./data/redis:/data
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5

  openwebui:
    image: ghcr.io/open-webui/open-webui:latest
    container_name: openwebui-app-$env
    depends_on:
      postgresql:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    environment:
      # –ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://openwebui_user:\${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-secure_password_123}@postgresql:5432/openwebui_db
      
      # Redis –¥–ª—è –∫—ç—à–∞ –∏ —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–π
      REDIS_URL: redis://:\${REDIS_PASSWORD:-redis_secure_123}@redis:6379
      
      # –ë–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å
      WEBUI_SECRET_KEY: \${WEBUI_SECRET_KEY:-your_super_secret_key_here_change_me}
      WEBUI_JWT_SECRET_KEY: \${JWT_SECRET_KEY:-jwt_secret_change_me}
      
      # OAuth –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ (–∑–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏ —Å–≤–æ–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ)
      OAUTH_MERGE_ACCOUNTS_BY_EMAIL: true
      ENABLE_OAUTH_SIGNUP: true
      OAUTH_PROVIDERS: "google,github"
      
      # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
      WEBUI_AUTH_TRUSTED_EMAIL_HEADER: ""
      LOG_LEVEL: INFO
      
      # RBAC –∏ —Ä–æ–ª–∏
      DEFAULT_USER_ROLE: pending
      ENABLE_SIGNUP: false
      ENABLE_LOGIN_FORM: true
      
      # –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏
      WEBUI_URL: https://openwebui-$env.local:$((3000 + port_offset))
      PORT: 8080
      
    ports:
      - "$((3000 + port_offset)):8080"
    volumes:
      - ./data/openwebui:/app/backend/data
      - ./logs/openwebui:/app/backend/logs
      - ./certs:/app/certs:ro
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8080/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3

  nginx:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: openwebui-nginx-$env
    depends_on:
      - openwebui
    ports:
      - "$((80 + port_offset)):80"
      - "$((443 + port_offset)):443"
    volumes:
      - ./config/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./certs:/etc/nginx/certs:ro
      - ./logs/nginx:/var/log/nginx
    restart: unless-stopped

  # –ú–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ —Å Grafana
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    container_name: openwebui-grafana-$env
    environment:
      GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD: \${GRAFANA_PASSWORD:-admin_change_me}
      GF_USERS_ALLOW_SIGN_UP: false
      GF_USERS_DEFAULT_THEME: dark
      GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS: grafana-piechart-panel
    ports:
      - "$((3001 + port_offset)):3000"
    volumes:
      - ./grafana/data:/var/lib/grafana
      - ./grafana/dashboards:/var/lib/grafana/dashboards
      - ./grafana/provisioning:/etc/grafana/provisioning
    restart: unless-stopped

  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    container_name: openwebui-prometheus-$env
    command:
      - '--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml'
      - '--storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus'
      - '--web.console.libraries=/etc/prometheus/console_libraries'
      - '--web.console.templates=/etc/prometheus/consoles'
    ports:
      - "$((9090 + port_offset)):9090"
    volumes:
      - ./config/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml:ro
      - ./data/prometheus:/prometheus
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  openwebui-data-$env:
  postgresql-data-$env:
  grafana-data-$env:
  prometheus-data-$env:

networks:
  default:
    name: openwebui-corp-$env
    driver: bridge
EOF
}

# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Nginx
create_nginx_config() {
    local env=$1
    local port_offset=$2
    log_info "‚öôÔ∏è –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é Nginx –¥–ª—è $env..."
    
    cat > ~/openwebui-corp/$env/config/nginx.conf << EOF
events {
    worker_connections 1024;
}

http {
    upstream openwebui_backend {
        server openwebui:8080;
    }

    # Rate limiting
    limit_req_zone \$binary_remote_addr zone=api:10m rate=10r/s;
    limit_req_zone \$binary_remote_addr zone=login:10m rate=1r/s;

    server {
        listen 80;
        server_name openwebui-$env.local;
        return 301 https://\$server_name\$request_uri;
    }

    server {
        listen 443 ssl http2;
        server_name openwebui-$env.local;

        # SSL –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è
        ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/certs/server.crt;
        ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/certs/server.key;
        ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;
        ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA512:DHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA512:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384;
        ssl_prefer_server_ciphers off;

        # –ë–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–∫–æ–≤
        add_header X-Frame-Options DENY;
        add_header X-Content-Type-Options nosniff;
        add_header X-XSS-Protection "1; mode=block";
        add_header Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload";

        # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
        access_log /var/log/nginx/openwebui-access.log;
        error_log /var/log/nginx/openwebui-error.log;

        # Rate limiting –¥–ª—è API
        location /api/ {
            limit_req zone=api burst=20 nodelay;
            proxy_pass http://openwebui_backend;
            proxy_set_header Host \$host;
            proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
        }

        # Rate limiting –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏
        location /auth/ {
            limit_req zone=login burst=5 nodelay;
            proxy_pass http://openwebui_backend;
            proxy_set_header Host \$host;
            proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
        }

        # –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π location
        location / {
            proxy_pass http://openwebui_backend;
            proxy_set_header Host \$host;
            proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
            proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
            
            # –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ WebSocket
            proxy_http_version 1.1;
            proxy_set_header Upgrade \$http_upgrade;
            proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
        }
    }
}
EOF
}

# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Prometheus
create_prometheus_config() {
    local env=$1
    log_info "üìä –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é Prometheus –¥–ª—è $env..."
    
    cat > ~/openwebui-corp/$env/config/prometheus.yml << EOF
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'openwebui'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['openwebui:8080']
    metrics_path: '/metrics'
    scrape_interval: 30s

  - job_name: 'postgresql'

# 4. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤
log "‚öôÔ∏è –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Docker Compose..."

# –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π docker-compose.yml
cat > docker-compose.yml << EOF
version: '3.8'

services:
  openwebui:
    image: ghcr.io/open-webui/open-webui:latest
    container_name: openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3001:8080"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/app/backend/data
      - ./config:/app/backend/config
      - ./logs:/app/backend/logs
    environment:
      # Database Configuration
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT}:${DB_PASSWORD}@host.docker.internal:5432/openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT}
      
      # Security
      - WEBUI_SECRET_KEY=${JWT_SECRET}
      - WEBHOOK_SECRET=${WEBHOOK_SECRET}
      
      # Authentication
      - ENABLE_SIGNUP=false
      - DEFAULT_USER_ROLE=pending
      - ENABLE_OAUTH_SIGNUP=true
      
      # OAuth Configuration (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –≤ .env)
      - OAUTH_PROVIDER=${OAUTH_PROVIDER}
      
      # Features
      - ENABLE_RAG_HYBRID_SEARCH=true
      - ENABLE_RAG_WEB_LOADER=true
      - ENABLE_WEB_SEARCH=true
      
      # Logging
      - WEBUI_LOG_LEVEL=INFO
      - LOG_REQUESTS=true
      
      # Performance
      - MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE=100
      - REQUEST_TIMEOUT=300
      
      # Security Headers
      - ENABLE_SECURITY_HEADERS=true
      - ENABLE_HTTPS_REDIRECT=true
      
      # Admin
      - ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@${DOMAIN}
      
    extra_hosts:
      - "host.docker.internal:host-gateway"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8080/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - openwebui-network

  # Grafana –¥–ª—è –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    container_name: grafana-${ENVIRONMENT}
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3002:3000"
    environment:
      - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
      - GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS=grafana-clock-panel,grafana-simple-json-datasource
    volumes:
      - grafana-data:/var/lib/grafana
      - ./config/grafana:/etc/grafana/provisioning
    networks:
      - openwebui-network

  # Prometheus –¥–ª—è –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    container_name: prometheus-${ENVIRONMENT}
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:9090:9090"
    volumes:
      - ./config/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
      - prometheus-data:/prometheus
    command:
      - '--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml'
      - '--storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus'
      - '--web.console.libraries=/etc/prometheus/console_libraries'
      - '--web.console.templates=/etc/prometheus/consoles'
    networks:
      - openwebui-network

networks:
  openwebui-network:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  grafana-data:
  prometheus-data:
EOF

# 5. –§–∞–π–ª –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è
log "üîê –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è..."
cat > .env << EOF
# –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è OpenWebUI - ${ENVIRONMENT}
# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–æ: $(date)

# OAuth Configuration - –ù–ê–°–¢–†–û–ô –ü–û–î –°–í–û–ò –î–ê–ù–ù–´–ï!
# Google OAuth
GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=your-google-client-id
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=your-google-client-secret

# GitHub OAuth  
GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=your-github-client-id
GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=your-github-client-secret

# Microsoft OAuth
MICROSOFT_CLIENT_ID=your-microsoft-client-id

# OIDC (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, Keycloak)

# Integrations

# Generated Secrets (–ù–ï –ú–ï–ù–Ø–ô!)

# Domain

EOF

# 6. –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Prometheus
log "üìä –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞..."
mkdir -p config
cat > config/prometheus.yml << EOF
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'openwebui'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}:8080']
    metrics_path: '/metrics'
    scrape_interval: 30s

  - job_name: 'node-exporter'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['host.docker.internal:9100']
EOF

# 7. –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Nginx
log "üåê –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Nginx reverse proxy..."
sudo tee /etc/nginx/sites-available/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT} << EOF
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name ${DOMAIN};
    return 301 https://\$server_name\$request_uri;
}

server {
    listen 443 ssl http2;
    server_name ${DOMAIN};

    # SSL Configuration (–ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞)
    ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/${DOMAIN}/fullchain.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/${DOMAIN}/privkey.pem;
    
    # Security headers
    add_header X-Frame-Options DENY;
    add_header X-Content-Type-Options nosniff;
    add_header X-XSS-Protection "1; mode=block";
    add_header Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains";

    # OpenWebUI
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3001;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade \$http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
        proxy_cache_bypass \$http_upgrade;
        proxy_read_timeout 300s;
        proxy_connect_timeout 75s;
        
        # WebSocket support
        proxy_set_header Sec-WebSocket-Extensions \$http_sec_websocket_extensions;
        proxy_set_header Sec-WebSocket-Key \$http_sec_websocket_key;
        proxy_set_header Sec-WebSocket-Version \$http_sec_websocket_version;
    }

    # Grafana (–ø–æ–¥–¥–æ–º–µ–Ω –¥–ª—è –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞)
    location /grafana/ {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3002/;
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
    }
}
EOF

# –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞
sudo ln -sf /etc/nginx/sites-available/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT} /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/

# 8. –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
log "üîß –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è..."

# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞
cat > start.sh << 'EOF'

# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞
cat–ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–ª–∂—É —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç - –æ–Ω –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–µ—Ä–≤–∞–Ω –Ω–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–∞ –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞:

```bash
# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞
cat > backup.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -e
source .env

BACKUP_DATE=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)
BACKUP_DIR="./backups/${BACKUP_DATE}"

echo "üíæ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞ OpenWebUI..."
mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"

# –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
echo "üìä –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø PostgreSQL..."
pg_dump -h localhost -U openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} -d openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} > "${BACKUP_DIR}/database.sql"

# –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
echo "üìÅ –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤..."
tar -czf "${BACKUP_DIR}/data.tar.gz" ./data
tar -czf "${BACKUP_DIR}/config.tar.gz" ./config
cp .env "${BACKUP_DIR}/"
cp docker-compose.yml "${BACKUP_DIR}/"

# –û—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã—Ö –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–æ–≤ (—Å—Ç–∞—Ä—à–µ 30 –¥–Ω–µ–π)
find ./backups -type d -mtime +30 -exec rm -rf {} +

echo "‚úÖ –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω: $BACKUP_DIR"
EOF

# –ü—Ä–∞–≤–∞ –Ω–∞ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤
chmod +x *.sh

# 9. –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ SSL-—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
log "üîí –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ SSL-—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞..."
if [[ "$ENVIRONMENT" == "prod" ]]; then
    warn "–î–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∫—à–µ–Ω–∞ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π SSL-—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç..."
    sudo certbot --nginx -d "$DOMAIN" --non-interactive --agree-tos --email admin@"$DOMAIN"
else
    warn "–î–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º —Å–∞–º–æ–ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç..."
    sudo mkdir -p /etc/letsencrypt/live/"$DOMAIN"
    sudo openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 \
        -keyout /etc/letsencrypt/live/"$DOMAIN"/privkey.pem \
        -out /etc/letsencrypt/live/"$DOMAIN"/fullchain.pem \
        -subj "/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/O=OpenWebUI/CN=$DOMAIN"
fi

# 10. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ cron –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–±—ç–∫–∞–ø–æ–≤
log "‚è∞ –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–æ–≤..."
(crontab -l 2>/dev/null; echo "0 2 * * * cd ~/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT} && ./backup.sh >> logs/backup.log 2>&1") | crontab -

# 11. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ª–æ–≥—Ä–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏
log "üìù –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —Ä–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ª–æ–≥–æ–≤..."
sudo tee /etc/logrotate.d/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT} << EOF
~/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}/logs/*.log {
    daily
    missingok

}
EOF

# 12. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ systemd-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞
log "üîÑ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ systemd-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞..."
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}.service << EOF

# 13. –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–ª—É–∂–±

```bash
#!/bin/bash

# –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ OpenWebUI —Å PostgreSQL, OAuth, RBAC
# –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ OpenWebUI
# –í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è: 2024-12

set -euo pipefail

# –¶–≤–µ—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥–∞
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è
log() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1${NC}"
}

warn() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING] $1${NC}"
}

error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR] $1${NC}" >&2
    exit 1
}

# –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤ root
if [[ $EUID -eq 0 ]]; then
   error "–ù–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–π —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –ø–æ–¥ root! –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è —Å sudo."
fi

# –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –ø–æ–¥ —Å–≤–æ—é —Å—Ä–µ–¥—É)
ENVIRONMENT="${1:-dev}"  # dev –∏–ª–∏ prod
DOMAIN="${2:-openwebui.local}"
OAUTH_PROVIDER="${3:-google}"  # google, github, microsoft, oidc
DB_PASSWORD=$(openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d '=' | head -c 24)
JWT_SECRET=$(openssl rand -hex 32)
WEBHOOK_SECRET=$(openssl rand -hex 16)

# –í–∞–ª–∏–¥–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ–≤
if [[ ! "$ENVIRONMENT" =~ ^(dev|prod)$ ]]; then
    error "–ù–µ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–∞—è —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∞! –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π: dev –∏–ª–∏ prod"
fi

log "üöÄ –ù–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–µ–º –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—É—é —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫—É OpenWebUI"
log "–°—Ä–µ–¥–∞: $ENVIRONMENT | –î–æ–º–µ–Ω: $DOMAIN | OAuth: $OAUTH_PROVIDER"

# 1. –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
log "üì¶ –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π..."
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo apt install -y \
    docker.io docker-compose-plugin \
    postgresql-client \
    nginx \
    certbot python3-certbot-nginx \
    htop curl wget git \
    jq unzip

# –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—É docker
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER

# 2. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ PostgreSQL
log "üóÑÔ∏è –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ PostgreSQL..."
sudo apt install -y postgresql postgresql-contrib
sudo systemctl enable postgresql
sudo systemctl start postgresql

# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è
sudo -u postgres psql << EOF
CREATE DATABASE openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT};
CREATE USER openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD '${DB_PASSWORD}';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} TO openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT};
ALTER USER openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} CREATEDB;
\q
EOF

# 3. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤
log "üìÅ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤..."
mkdir -p ~/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}/{config,data,logs,ssl,backups}
cd ~/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}

# 4. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤
log "‚öôÔ∏è –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Docker Compose..."

# –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π docker-compose.yml
cat > docker-compose.yml << EOF
version: '3.8'

services:
  openwebui:
    image: ghcr.io/open-webui/open-webui:latest
    container_name: openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3001:8080"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/app/backend/data
      - ./config:/app/backend/config
      - ./logs:/app/backend/logs
    environment:
      # Database Configuration
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT}:${DB_PASSWORD}@host.docker.internal:5432/openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT}
      
      # Security
      - WEBUI_SECRET_KEY=${JWT_SECRET}
      - WEBHOOK_SECRET=${WEBHOOK_SECRET}
      
      # Authentication
      - ENABLE_SIGNUP=false
      - DEFAULT_USER_ROLE=pending
      - ENABLE_OAUTH_SIGNUP=true
      
      # OAuth Configuration (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –≤ .env)
      - OAUTH_PROVIDER=${OAUTH_PROVIDER}
      
      # Features
      - ENABLE_RAG_HYBRID_SEARCH=true
      - ENABLE_RAG_WEB_LOADER=true
      - ENABLE_WEB_SEARCH=true
      
      # Logging
      - WEBUI_LOG_LEVEL=INFO
      - LOG_REQUESTS=true
      
      # Performance
      - MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE=100
      - REQUEST_TIMEOUT=300
      
      # Security Headers
      - ENABLE_SECURITY_HEADERS=true
      - ENABLE_HTTPS_REDIRECT=true
      
      # Admin
      - ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@${DOMAIN}
      
    extra_hosts:
      - "host.docker.internal:host-gateway"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8080/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - openwebui-network

  # Grafana –¥–ª—è –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    container_name: grafana-${ENVIRONMENT}
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3002:3000"
    environment:
      - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
      - GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS=grafana-clock-panel,grafana-simple-json-datasource
    volumes:
      - grafana-data:/var/lib/grafana
      - ./config/grafana:/etc/grafana/provisioning
    networks:
      - openwebui-network

  # Prometheus –¥–ª—è –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    container_name: prometheus-${ENVIRONMENT}
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:9090:9090"
    volumes:
      - ./config/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
      - prometheus-data:/prometheus
    command:
      - '--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml'
      - '--storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus'
      - '--web.console.libraries=/etc/prometheus/console_libraries'
      - '--web.console.templates=/etc/prometheus/consoles'
    networks:
      - openwebui-network

networks:
  openwebui-network:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  grafana-data:
  prometheus-data:
EOF

# 5. –§–∞–π–ª –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è
log "üîê –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è..."
cat > .env << EOF
# –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è OpenWebUI - ${ENVIRONMENT}
# –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–æ: $(date)

# OAuth Configuration - –ù–ê–°–¢–†–û–ô –ü–û–î –°–í–û–ò –î–ê–ù–ù–´–ï!
# Google OAuth
GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=your-google-client-id
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=your-google-client-secret

# GitHub OAuth  
GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=your-github-client-id
GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=your-github-client-secret

# Microsoft OAuth
MICROSOFT_CLIENT_ID=your-microsoft-client-id
MICROSOFT_CLIENT_SECRET=your-microsoft-client-secret

# OIDC (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, Keycloak)
OIDC_CLIENT_ID=your-oidc-client-id
OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET=your-oidc-client-secret
OIDC_PROVIDER_URL=https://your-oidc-provider.com/auth/realms/master

# Integrations
TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=your-telegram-bot-token
SLACK_BOT_TOKEN=your-slack-bot-token

# Generated Secrets (–ù–ï –ú–ï–ù–Ø–ô!)
DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
JWT_SECRET=${JWT_SECRET}
WEBHOOK_SECRET=${WEBHOOK_SECRET}

# Domain
DOMAIN=${DOMAIN}

EOF

# 6. –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Prometheus
log "üìä –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞..."
mkdir -p config
cat > config/prometheus.yml << EOF
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'openwebui'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT}:8080']
    metrics_path: '/metrics'
    scrape_interval: 30s

  - job_name: 'node-exporter'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['host.docker.internal:9100']
EOF

# 7. –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Nginx
log "üåê –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Nginx reverse proxy..."
sudo tee /etc/nginx/sites-available/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT} << EOF
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name ${DOMAIN};
    return 301 https://\$server_name\$request_uri;
}

server {
    listen 443 ssl http2;
    server_name ${DOMAIN};

    # SSL Configuration (–ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞)
    ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/${DOMAIN}/fullchain.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/${DOMAIN}/privkey.pem;
    
    # Security headers
    add_header X-Frame-Options DENY;
    add_header X-Content-Type-Options nosniff;
    add_header X-XSS-Protection "1; mode=block";
    add_header Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains";

    # OpenWebUI
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3001;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade \$http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
        proxy_cache_bypass \$http_upgrade;
        proxy_read_timeout 300s;
        proxy_connect_timeout 75s;
        
        # WebSocket support
        proxy_set_header Sec-WebSocket-Extensions \$http_sec_websocket_extensions;
        proxy_set_header Sec-WebSocket-Key \$http_sec_websocket_key;
        proxy_set_header Sec-WebSocket-Version \$http_sec_websocket_version;
    }

    # Grafana (–ø–æ–¥–¥–æ–º–µ–Ω –¥–ª—è –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞)
    location /grafana/ {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3002/;
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
    }
}
EOF

# –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞
sudo ln -sf /etc/nginx/sites-available/openwebui-${ENVIRONMENT} /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/
sudo nginx -t || error "–û—à–∏–±–∫–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Nginx!"

# 8. –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
log "üîß –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è..."

# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞
cat > start.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -e
source .env
echo "üöÄ –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ OpenWebUI (${ENVIRONMENT})..."
docker compose up -d
echo "‚úÖ OpenWebUI –∑–∞–ø—É—â–µ–Ω!"
echo "üåê –î–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø: https://${DOMAIN}"
echo "üìä Grafana: https://${DOMAIN}/grafana (admin:${DB_PASSWORD})"
EOF

# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏
cat > stop.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
echo "üõë –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ OpenWebUI..."
docker compose down
echo "‚úÖ –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ!"
EOF

# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
cat > update.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -e
echo "üîÑ –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ OpenWebUI..."
docker compose pull
docker compose up -d
echo "‚úÖ –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ!"

# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞
cat–ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–ª–∂—É —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç - –æ–Ω –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–µ—Ä–≤–∞–Ω –Ω–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–∞ –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞:

```bash
# –°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞
cat > backup.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -e
source .env

BACKUP_DATE=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)
BACKUP_DIR="./backups/${BACKUP_DATE}"

echo "üíæ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–∞ OpenWebUI..."
mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"

# –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
echo "üìä –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø PostgreSQL..."
pg_dump -h localhost -U openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} -d openwebui_${ENVIRONMENT} > "${BACKUP_DIR}/database.sql"

# –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
echo "üìÅ –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤..."
tar -czf "${BACKUP_DIR}/data.tar.gz" ./data
tar -czf "${BACKUP_DIR}/config.tar.gz" ./config
cp .env "${BACKUP_DIR}/"
cp docker-compose.yml "${BACKUP_DIR}/"

# –û—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã—Ö –±—ç–∫–∞–ø–æ–≤ (—Å—Ç–∞—Ä—à–µ 30 –¥–Ω–µ–π)
find ./backups -type d -mtime +30 -exec rm -rf {} +

echo "‚úÖ –ë—ç–∫–∞–ø —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω: $BACKUP_DIR"
EOF

# –ü—Ä–∞–≤–∞ –Ω–∞ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤
chmod +x *.sh

# 9. –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ SSL-—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
